data.name: Hyper Mum Ft Adult Gaming - Wallpaper Pack
data.detailed_description:
Free wallpaper pack - Includes 3 Hyper Mum Ft Adult Gaming wallpapers, based on the in-game Virtual Girlfriend Mini-game.

High quality 1920x1080 and 1280x720 resolutions of the wallpapers in PNG format included.

New content may be added over time.
Wallpapers accessed via "Wallpaper Pack" folder located in the game installation folder. Enjoy.

Personal use only.

data.short_description: Includes 3 wallpapers for those of you who love the artwork and would like to see it on your desktop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 , 8 , 10
  • Processor: Quad Core @ 3ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 1030 2gb / Equivalent
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Disk space required does not include game installation size and may increase with content updates.
